name: Infinity Runner (itch) (Sidnei Carraro Junior)
description:
Hi,

This is my new game, it's a 2D Ininite runner.

The game is quite simple, but i used to learn new things and put some skills in pratice.

To play you just need to jump and avoid the obstacles, get some coins and buy new items or upgrades.

I hope you enjoy the game and have some fun.
